settings.benefit: Let Homey export all Insights from a flow

tab1.title: NAS
tab1.instructions: Export to NAS, or any other windows network share, is possible via the SAMBA protocol. Enable 'Use SMB', and fill in the required parameters to access the network share. SEE THE EXAMPLES ON HOW TO USE SLASH (/)! Test to verify if the settings are correct, and save them. Now you can start exporting Insights to a network share from a flow.

tab2.title: WebDAV
tab2.instructions: Export to a web folder is possible via the WebDAV protocol. Enable 'Use WebDAV', and fill in the required parameters to access the WebDAV folder. Test to verify if the settings are correct, and save them. Now you can start exporting Insights to a web folder from a flow.

tab3.title: FTP
tab3.instructions: Export to a FTP folder is possible via the FTP protocol. Enable 'Use FTP', and fill in the required parameters to access the FTP folder. Test to verify if the settings are correct, and save them. Now you can start exporting Insights to a FTP folder from a flow.

tab4.title: Export
tab4.instructions: First setup NAS and/or FTP and/or WebDAV. Then select which app to export, and the resolution.
tab4.confirmExport: Are you sure? Exporting Insights can take more then 10 minutes!
